title: President Visits UN Headquarters in Africa
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa this morning (13) visited the United Nations Office at Nairobi (UNON), the only U.N. headquarters in Africa. Located in an area a short distance from Nairobi, the complex is situated on 146 acres comprising of more than 80 buildings that house more than 50 U.N. organizations with a total staff exceeding 3,500….
